DocAttribute.Name: TorsionalConstantX
DocAttribute.Documentation: Torsional constant about X-axis of profile coordinate system. Usually measured in [mm4].

DocAttribute.Name: MomentOfInertiaYZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Moment of inertia about Y and Z-axes of profile coordinate system. Usually measured in [mm4].

DocAttribute.Name: MomentOfInertiaY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Moment of inertia about Y-axis of profile coordinate system. Usually measured in [mm4].

DocAttribute.Name: MomentOfInertiaZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Moment of inertia about Z-axis of profile coordinate system. Usually measured in [mm4].

DocAttribute.Name: WarpingConstant
DocAttribute.Documentation: Warping constant of the profile for torsional action. Usually measured in [mm6].

DocAttribute.Name: ShearCentreZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Location of the profile's shear centre in the structural Z direction. Mapped on IFC profile coordinate system it is the offset in the direction of the negative Y axis. The offset is relative to the center of gravity. The _ShearCentreZ_ is measured in the global length unit as defined at _IfcProject.UnitsInContext_.

DocAttribute.Name: ShearCentreY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Location of the profile's shear centre in the structural Y direction. Mapped on IFC profile coordinate system it is the offset in the direction of the negative X axis. The offset is relative to the center of gravity. The _ShearCentreY_ is measured in the global length unit as defined at _IfcProject.UnitsInContext_.

DocAttribute.Name: ShearDeformationAreaZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Area of the profile for calculating the shear deformation for a shear force parallel to the profile's Z-axis. Usually measured in [mm2].

DocAttribute.Name: ShearDeformationAreaY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Area of the profile for calculating the shear deformation for a shear force parallel to the profile's Y-axis. Usually measured in [mm2].

DocAttribute.Name: MaximumSectionModulusY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Bending resistance about Y-axis of profile coordinate system at maximum Z-ordinate. Usually measured in [mm3].

DocAttribute.Name: MinimumSectionModulusY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Bending resistance about Y-axis of profile coordinate system at minimum Z-ordinate. Usually measured in [mm3].

DocAttribute.Name: MaximumSectionModulusZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Bending resistance about Z-axis of profile coordinate system at maximum Y-ordinate. Usually measured in [mm3].

DocAttribute.Name: MinimumSectionModulusZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Bending resistance about Z-axis of profile coordinate system at minimum Y-ordinate. Usually measured in [mm3].

DocAttribute.Name: TorsionalSectionModulus
DocAttribute.Documentation: Torsional resistance (about the profiles X-axis). Usually measured in [mm3].

DocAttribute.Name: CentreOfGravityInX
DocAttribute.Documentation: Location of the profile's centre of gravity in the geometric X direction. The _CentreOfGravityInX_ is measured in the global length unit as defined at _IfcProject.UnitsInContext_. > IFC2x Edition 3 CHANGE  The attribute CentreOfGravityInX is a new attribute.

DocAttribute.Name: CentreOfGravityInY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Location of the profile's centre of gravity in the geometric Y direction. The _CentreOfGravityInY_ is measured in the global length unit as defined at _IfcProject.UnitsInContext_. > IFC2x Edition 3 CHANGE  The attribute CentreOfGravityInY is a new attribute.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The shear deformation area y shall have a value, if given, being greater than zero.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR22
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The shear deformation area z shall have a value, if given, being greater than zero.
